EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_CrossingTheValueStream_WP_Q118.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Crossing the Value Stream: Improving Development with Pivotal and Cloud Foundry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Crossing the Value Stream: Improving Development with Pivotal and Cloud Foundry white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-crossing-the-value-stream-white-paper]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
